welcome.title: Welcome to OnePredict

deposit.description: Fund your own wallet to start making predictions.

trade.description: Buy or sell outcomes based on your belief — prices reflect the crowd's probability estimate.

earn.title: Earn
earn.description: If your prediction is correct, you win!

welcome.terms: By proceeding, you confirm you're at least 18 and accept our terms

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved. Please check the URL or return to the homepage to continue browsing.
